# HF11 Lipidomics Data Analysis

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
    ####Set R Session, Download Data and Explore XCMS results####
    ## try http:// if https:// URLs are not supported
    #source("https://bioconductor.org/biocLite.R")
    #biocLite("xcms")
    #install.packages("ggplot2")
    #Prepare your R session
    #library(xcms)
    library(ggplot2)
    library(reshape2)
    #library(downloader)
    library(gridExtra)

    # read text file 
    SCN = read.delim("SCN_final.txt", header = TRUE, sep = "\t")
    Plasma = read.delim("Plasma_final.txt", header = TRUE, sep = "\t")
    Liver = read.delim("Liver_final.txt", header = TRUE, sep = "\t")
```

## Data Summary

Summarized Data for SCN_Positive look like:
```{r echo = FALSE}
summary(SCN)
```
Summarized Data for Plasma_Positive:
```{r  echo = FALSE}
summary(Plasma)
```
Summarized Data for Liver_Positive:
```{r  echo = FALSE}
summary(Liver)
```

Done!
